title: Aurelion Sol can be seen in the fog of war???????
body: So my last match as of writing this the enemy Sol was visible in the fog of war until i died I was playing talon any idea how this is caused?

replies.body: I did q him I do know it gives vision but I had vision of him for atleast 2 minutes
Did you Q him? Your Q gives you vision the target u hit.

Hey Lshadowviperkao! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working to get a fix in ASAP.
K just wanted this to be known
ok in my recording it doe show it our team having vision of him its at 9:48 until i die as talon that we can see him walking from base

i have the game recorded in lsi but i dont know really how to send the file
or if it can show that.

no thats not what im talking about what it is hes just visable no matter what hes doing i saw him walk from base into lane without e
idk what caused it
but when i died it stopped so idk if was something like me q as talon or what
I believe he is visible to enemy team while using E to fly.
There is a bug where you can see him across map.
Oh, i thought they disabled him to hotfix that.
